name: Frequency Qigong
description:
Had a rough day? Come and empty your mind by doing some qigong stake standing! Nothing fancy and exhausting! Stake standing is simple and everyone can do. 

Stake standing is the very fundemantal of qigong practise. It is standing meditation and helps cultivate energy through your whole body. 

The game helps you to visualize the qi when you do the stake standing, and it also provides a timer. Moreover, the game contains well-picked meditation music of different frequencies to help you open up the chakras. Game contains several scenes well designed for you to empty the mind.

This game includes 2 very basic yet most important qigong stances to help you improve your energy. These 2 stances are also of critical importance viewed by many Kungfu masters. 

1. Hunyuan stance

The very basic stance of Taiji quan. 

2. Santi Stance

The very basic stance of Xingyi quan.

more to be added in future. 

NOTE: Hand tracking required

support quest/quest2
